channel.title: A country exit node
channel.description: I want to specify exit node to a specific country. which file is needed to be edited to make it?

item.title: A country exit node
item.dc:creator: 0brand
item.description:
Hi lykedy

You can edit your torrc.

sudo nano /usr/local/etc/torrc.d/50_user.conf

Then add the exit node(s) you wan to use. As per: https://2019.www.torproject.org/docs/tor-manual.html.en

ExitNodes node,node,â€¦

A list of identity fingerprints, country codes, and address patterns of nodes to use as exit node---that is, a node that delivers traffic for you outside the Tor network. See the ExcludeNodes option for more information on how to specify nodes.

Keep in mind this will degrade anonymity. You should not use a static exit node for any length of time. By default Tor changes exit nodes every 10 minutes or so.

Read full topic
